## CeilNode class

Rounds up to the nearest integer

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class CeilNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns the smallest integer value not less than x. Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
